basic.description: This course covers linear free energy relationships, inductive effects, treatment of steric effects, prediction of enthalpies and entropies of formation, kinetics and potential energy diagrams, isotope effects, general acid-base catalysis, acidity functions and their use in studies of mechanisms, strategies of investigation of mechanisms.
basic.subject: CHM
basic.title: Physical Organic Chemistry

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Mastery of undergraduate organic chemistry.
